name: Laberynth Rescue
description:
After the defeat of the mythical Minotaur, you are given the task to rescue all the people who is still inside of the maze. To do this you must first organize the people into small groups getting them all in One Room per section. Your commands are given with the keys W,A,S,D. However people are lost and they interpret your instructions in different ways. Now with the bless of the gods, start your journey. Good luck!

Things not finished in time:

Unlocking levels

Limiting moves (We added just a counter)

Balanced difficulty (Levels 8 and 9 are really hard, but possible)

More than 9 levels

FOR PLAY IN WINDOWS:

-Download the zip file named Windows.zip

-decompress it

-open the folder and execute OneRoom.exe
